Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan and Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Irving Park, Sheridan, then resume their normal route on Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Northbound Reroute near 43rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Northbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via LaSalle, 43rd, State, 39th and LaSalle: due to, street blockage near 43rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via LaSalle, 43rd, State, 39th and LaSalle: due to, street blockage near 43rd/LaSalle.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
